mapper.select: SELECT U.usable_house_number-COUNT(DISTINCT house_id) FROM sys_user U, pay_order P WHERE U.id = #{userId} AND P.biz_type = "Buy" AND P.is_deleted = 0 AND P.house_id <> 0 AND P.user_id = #{userId}
SELECT usable_house_number FROM sys_user WHERE id = #{userId}
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT house_id) FROM pay_order WHERE biz_type = "Buy" AND is_deleted = 0 AND house_id <> 0 AND user_id = #{userId}
SELECT DISTINCT house_id FROM pay_order WHERE pay_state = "SUCCESS" AND biz_type = "Buy" AND is_deleted = 0 AND house_id <> 0 AND user_id = #{userId}

SELECT DISTINCT bh.*, bl.living_name, ba.long_code AS areaLongCode FROM base_house bh LEFT JOIN base_living bl ON bl.id = bh.living_id LEFT JOIN base_area ba ON ba.area_code = bl.area_id LEFT JOIN pay_order po ON po.house_id = bh.id WHERE bh.id IN ( SELECT DISTINCT house_id FROM pay_order WHERE pay_state = "SUCCESS" AND biz_type = "Buy" AND is_deleted = 0 AND house_id <> 0 AND user_id = #{userId} ) ORDER BY po.gmt_create DESC LIMIT #{start}, #{limit}

SELECT alearyCount > 0 OR U.usable_house_number - COUNT(DISTINCT house_id) > 0 FROM sys_user U, pay_order P, ( SELECT COUNT(1) AS alearyCount FROM pay_order WHERE biz_type = "Buy" AND is_deleted = 0 AND house_id <> 0 AND user_id = #{userId} AND house_id = #{houseId} ) AS C WHERE U.id = #{userId} AND P.biz_type = "Buy" AND P.is_deleted = 0 AND P.house_id <> 0 AND P.user_id = #{userId}
